| History                 = Clan Kaishek is Mongolia's oldest and most powerful clan. The clan is over a 1200 years old, having its origins in the court of [[Kublai Khan (Earth-616)|Kublai Khan]]. In the imperial court, they served as an elite force and as advisors in the khan's army. Meanwhile they stole from tributes the court received to build their private fortress. It's a clan of warriors and conquerors, whose criminal empire spans throughout Asia and eastern Europe.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 150|153}}

[[Clan Yashida (Earth-616)|Clan Yashida]] came under their control after the deaths of Shingen & [[Mariko Yashida (Earth-616)|Mariko Yashida]]. [[Gom Kaishek (Earth-616)|Gom Kaishek]] took [[Yukio (Earth-616)|Yukio]] and Amiko as hostages to force Wolverine to assassinate his brother [[Haan Kaishek]], so he could take over the clan.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 150}} Turned out it was their sister [[Kia Kaishek]] setting up her brothers, as Grom was killed by Haan and she herself killed {{r|Wolverine Vol 2 151|152}} Kia went to the fortress and killed her father [[Yolyn Kaishek (Earth-616)|Yolyn Kaishek]], in an attempt to take over the clan. During her fight with Wolverine, gas ignited which destroyed the fortress and killed Kai.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 153}}

| Trivia                  = * The Clan Kaishek appears to be the oldest organized crime "family" (excluding terrorist groups like Hydra which also involve themselves in organized crime). That means this organized crime group is even older than the Chinese Triads (the oldest in the real world, and second oldest in Earth-616 after Clan Kaishek).
